Articles.Content:
Hi there,

I've been looking for a mod that has an Orion-like crew pod (crew capacity of 4) for stock-alike games, but failed. Doues anyone know about one for 1.2.2?

Thanks,

Michal.don

Yes, here you go https://www.google.com/url?sa=t&rct=j&q=&esrc=s&source=web&cd=1&cad=rja&uact=8&sqi=2&ved=0ahUKEwjArLCzvZ_SAhUKhlQKHWaKDxUQFggaMAA&url=http%3A%2F%2Fforum.kerbalspaceprogram.com%2Findex.php%3F%2Ftopic%2F126067-12-space-launch-system-basic-version-113stock-dimension%2F&usg=AFQjCNG8k6fDNZe03e-SphAYacFaJTXFiQ&sig2=PwEpqUeeZ2PvqAwZ26j7pQ&bvm=bv.147448319,d.amc (this mod is meant for NASA's Space Launch System, but it has Orion capsule stuff)

Edited February 20, 2017 by F3ARSTUNTS
